tool_description: An API sends a mail with a your Gmail account.
name: Mail Sender
title: Mail Sender

api_list.name: Send html-based mail body with this endpoint.
api_list.description: This API contains a body object(JSON) to send mails.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mail-sender4.p.rapidapi.com/mail/html-content"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mail-sender4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send normal text-based mail with this endpoint.
api_list.description: this endpoint contains the following body object(JSON).
